quote: When James Clapper himself, and virtually everyone else with knowledge of the witch hunt, says there is no collusion, when does it end?
quotePlain: When James Clapper himself, and virtually everyone else with knowledge of the witch hunt, says there is no collusion, when does it end?
name: Donald Trump

checks.short: Clapper said he wouldn't have been told of an investigation into collusion.
checks.shortPlain: Clapper said he wouldn’t have been told of an investigation into collusion.

claims.title: James Clapper confirmed there is no evidence of Russia/Trump collusion
claims.negative: James Clapper did not confirm there is no evidence of Russia/Trump collusion
claims.negativePlain: James Clapper did not confirm there is no evidence of Russia/Trump collusion
claims.truth: Clapper only said he wasn't aware of an investigation.
claims.truthPlain: Clapper only said he wasn’t aware of an investigation.
